extendedInfo.description: Calculate Pennsylvania child support easily,  instantly, and accurately.  Share data with your PC.

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: So easy to use. Helped me see how bad I was getting taken by the courts...filed for a modification.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pa Child support App
reviews.comment: This app is great.How wonderful to be able to have my support calculation program with me anywhere I go. Easy to use, accurate and I can send to my desktop computer for later use. Really helps to settle cases.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extremely useful!
reviews.comment: Another good one for lawyers practicing in Pennsylvania is the Docket In Your Pocket app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Clean, simple, effective Perfect use of smartphone platform for a financial calculation app. The report comes out clean and simple, with easy integration to a home computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect Support Calculation Companion I can now do basic calcs on my Droid- anywhere/anytime. If they are \"keepers\" I can load them into Family Law Software and do a more detailed analysis. This app is easy, effective and efficient!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Quick, clean. Love the report and data upload to PC.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Two Thumbs Up!
reviews.comment: Works great! Simple and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
